scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const dirs = ['.next', '.turbo']; const files = ['tsconfig.tsbuildinfo']; const rm = (item) => { try { const stat = fs.statSync(item); if (stat.isDirectory()) { fs.rmSync(item, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Removed:', item); } else { fs.unlinkSync(item); console.log('Removed:', item); } } catch (e) {} }; dirs.forEach(rm); files.forEach(rm); try { const cachePath = path.join('node_modules', '.cache'); if (fs.existsSync(cachePath)) { fs.rmSync(cachePath, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Removed: node_modules/.cache'); } } catch (e) {}"
